english.segment1: I left you two alone. With nothing really wrong. But you messed up the party. I never did you wrong. You keep on wasting holidays. I guess I could be wrong. I never wasted holidays. A friend like you is all I need. I want to know. You messed up the party. I never did you wrong. You keep on wasting holidays. I guess I could be wrong. I never wasted holidays. I want to know..
